name: mongodb
description: 1) It's not No SQL, It's NOT ONLY SQL. 2) NoSQL Database is used to refer a non-SQL or non-relational database. 3) It's not even a replacement to RDBMS. 4) No-SQL database dosen't use tables for storing data. 5) As compared to older days, we are saving more and more data. 6) It is generally used to store big-data and real time web applications.
author: Sneha Varshney
